name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, a student protest occurred at the North Campus of Linyi No. 1 Middle School in Shandong Province. The cause of the protest was that the school's "three days off and one day off" system during the Mid-Autumn Festival aroused dissatisfaction among students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, Chen Si, a Shanghai food delivery man who claimed to have earned 1.02 million yuan in three years, was reported to have been involved in a car accident. On the same day, a friend of Chen Si told reporters that Chen Si was indeed involved in a car accident while delivering food in Jiading District on the evening of the 17th, "with a fracture, and (the injury) is not light", and is currently receiving treatment in the hospital, accompanied by a friend.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, netizens submitted a post with the requirements for the Youth League Day activities at Fujian University of Water Resources and Hydropower.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, China Traffic Radio reported that in order to ensure the implementation of the Ye-Lu Expressway, a key project in Henan Province, the leaders of the Ye County People's Government led a team to forcibly demolish a college student entrepreneurial orchard, cut off the orchard's power supply, blocked the surrounding roads, snatched the mobile phones of people who came to take photos and collect evidence, pressed the people in the mud, and detained them in the police station for a whole day. Ye County Deputy Mayor Hu Weize said that for the progress of the project, he was willing to take responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the famous voice actor Shi Banyu passed away. On this day last year, he released a video complaining about the forced demolition of his studio in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the entry "Jiangmen No. 1 Middle School Principal Uses Student Holidays" has become a hot search on Tieba. The reason for the incident is that Xia Zhiqing, the principal of Jiangmen No. 1 Middle School in Guangdong, decided to use part of the Mid-Autumn Festival holiday to make up lessons, setting a precedent for making up lessons for the first and second graders of Jiangmen No. 1 Middle School during the Mid-Autumn Festival, which caused dissatisfaction among students. A 15-minute shouting activity broke out in the dormitory. Principal Xia Zhiqing has long been unpopular among students, and some students even established an "Anti-Qing (Xia Zhiqing) Alliance" to oppose his high-pressure management.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
G13 bus in Changchun City, Jilin Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Japanese Embassy in China, a child from a Japanese school in Shenzhen was attacked and injured on the way to school. He died in the early morning of the 19th after failed rescue efforts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Japanese Embassy in China posted a warning about the attack on its Japanese website, urging the public to be vigilant. The Chinese website did not have this information.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said: China will continue to take effective measures to ensure the safety of all foreigners in China. Chinese netizens responded, "Thank you for your hard work, brother" and "Thank you for your hard work, brother! Three cups to you!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, a group of Chinese living in Japan issued a joint statement condemning the September 18 attack on Japanese schoolchildren in Shenzhen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, topics related to the attack on Japanese elementary school students in Shenzhen have been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, some Shenzhen citizens went to the gate of the Japanese school to lay flowers to mourn the children who died in the attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 19, Suqian, Jiangsu. A car hit pedestrians on the east side of Sizhou School, and some students and parents fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the internet celebrity "Juanzi Loves to Eat", who has 410,000 followers, joked during a live broadcast that 918 was "618", saying that she didn't care about it. Subsequently, the internet celebrity's live broadcast room was blocked and her account was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lianhe Zaobao tells the details of the attack on a primary school student at a Japanese school in Shenzhen
At the time, he was accompanied by his mother to school. After the attack, he had large knife wounds on his abdomen and thighs, "his intestines were exposed."
The mother's hands were covered in blood and she collapsed and asked for help: "What did my child do wrong?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of September 19, Liu Wenjie, Party Secretary and Director of the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance, died unexpectedly. There were rumors that the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance was tied up and thrown off the building. The Paper reported that three people fell from the building and died.
